attributes.action: Call for a public inquiry to investigate the claims made by the Leave campaign.
attributes.additional_details: The parliamentary discussion and the public inquiry should establish if these claims were true at the time of the statements and if the promises made are sustainable for the current government to carry through.
attributes.background: We call upon parliament to establish a public inquiry into the claims made by the Leave campaign in their official communications and by their representatives during the EU Referendum, upon which the majority of the voting public based their decision.
